name: Snow Horse
description: This is Snow Horse - the snowboarding game you never asked for, where the points are made up and you are a horse riding a snowboard. Official Twitch Levels and Twitch Snowboard Graphic!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: It's a snowboarding horse game, it can run on anything
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: It's a snowboarding horse game, it can run on anything
